DOC.brief_summary: To see if using ipod games can improve mental functioning
DOC.criteria: Cirrhosis proven by biopsy, radiology or endoscopy Age 1870 Able to give informed consent Cognitive dysfunction defined by impaired performance on standard cognitive tests Illicit drug or alcohol use within 3 months Transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunt (TIPS) placement Need for psychoactive medications apart from continuous antidepressants or methadone Any focal neurological deficit or neuromuscular disease Inability to function with an iPod Inability to understand English For MRI: inability to perform brain MRI is an exclusion
